submodules.title: Task List View
submodules.description: A clean and organized display of all tasks, categorized by day. Users can easily navigate through their tasks, view details, and check off completed items.

submodules.title: Task Creation Form
submodules.description: An intuitive form that allows users to add new tasks with fields for title, description, due date, and priority level. Includes validation to ensure all necessary information is provided.

submodules.title: Task Editing Interface
submodules.description: A user-friendly interface for updating existing tasks. Users can modify task details, change due dates, and adjust priority levels with ease.

submodules.title: Responsive Design
submodules.description: Ensures the app is accessible and functional across various devices, including desktops, tablets, and smartphones, providing a seamless user experience.

submodules.title: Task Management API
submodules.description: RESTful API endpoints that handle all task-related operations, including creating, updating, deleting, and retrieving tasks. Ensures data integrity and security.

submodules.title: User Authentication
submodules.description: Secure user authentication system that allows users to register, log in, and manage their accounts. Implements token-based authentication for secure session management.

submodules.title: Data Storage
submodules.description: Utilizes a robust database to store user tasks, ensuring quick retrieval and efficient management of task data. Supports data backup and recovery mechanisms.

submodules.title: Task Categorization
submodules.description: Allows users to categorize tasks by tags or labels, making it easier to filter and manage tasks based on specific criteria or projects.

submodules.title: Due Date Reminders
submodules.description: Sends notifications or reminders to users about upcoming due dates for tasks, helping them stay on track and manage their time effectively.

submodules.title: Task Prioritization
submodules.description: Enables users to assign priority levels to tasks (e.g., high, medium, low), allowing them to focus on what matters most and manage their workload efficiently.

submodules.title: Dark Mode
submodules.description: Provides a dark mode option for users who prefer a darker interface, reducing eye strain and enhancing usability in low-light environments.

submodules.title: Search Functionality
submodules.description: A powerful search feature that allows users to quickly find specific tasks by keywords, due dates, or categories, improving overall efficiency.

submodules.title: Task Completion Statistics
submodules.description: Provides users with insights into their task completion rates, helping them understand their productivity patterns and areas for improvement.

submodules.title: Daily Summary Reports
submodules.description: Generates daily summaries of tasks completed, tasks pending, and upcoming deadlines, allowing users to plan their day effectively.
